main event: A yellow fireball was sighted in the sky over Stage Bank, Republic Vietnam.
interesting points: The object initially appeared similar in size and shape to a football, then grew smaller and faded away,The witness reported that the fireball appeared to fly straight and level until it suddenly jerked upward before disappearing,The sighting lasted approximately 20 seconds,The reporting airman seemed sincere and was accurate at estimating elapsed time,Four other air policemen stationed at different locations confirmed the sighting.
sighted object: a yellow fireball in the sky
witness description: Dennis R. Bulkley, A1C, Air Force, and four other air policemen
